title: Generate Weekly Timesheet Report
description: An agent must pull timesheet data for a project and generate a summary report for the project manager.

tasks.description: Retrieve all timesheet entries for a specific project code for the past week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the correct timesheet data.

tasks.description: Summarize the total hours logged by each team member.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an accurate summary of hours per person.

tasks.description: Compare the total hours logged against the weekly budget and flag any overages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the variance against the budget.
